channel.title: Western Crime Anthology
channel.description:
This series of games are all in the Western Crime genre, and I intend to frame them all in the same location, albeit separated by time so that we don't have to constrain ourselves too closely to events in previous games.
As such, while it's highly recommended that you play all of the sessions for each individual game, you aren't expected to sign up to all three games.
![WesternCrime5|350x197](upload://asWW6C8TjenX8tTcKE70aLntx2k.gif)
**Seco Creek Vigilance Committee**
Seco Creek Vigilance Committee is an Old West RPG about justice, law, revenge, and the discrepancy between what is right and what is good.
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NBNQECIbNAsVnDYBbhM) [date=2022-11-07 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-11-07 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NBNQZsOokFzsT12VG2d) [date=2022-11-14 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-11-14 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
**Copperhead County**
Copperhead County is a Southern noir game about organized crime and political corruption in a fictional slice of present-day Tennessee. Steal, deal, and pursue the American Dream in a place where whiskey and blood run together.
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NBNRBkB2AVaP6ti1sur) [date=2022-11-21 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-11-21 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NBNRb1Lmb-jsypQR4Ph) [date=2022-11-28 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-11-28 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NBNRwQ0rOFEZ4iOqf4y) [date=2022-12-05 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-12-05 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NBNS4CUtjnmUKEAVXKA) [date=2022-12-12 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-12-12 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]
**Hollowpoint**
Hollowpoint drops you right in the action for mission-directed non-stop pursuit of terrible goals, designed for one-shots and convention play. No one in this game is innocent.
[One-Shot](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-NBNSnLrz_Ng_1c1Kz5k) [date=2022-12-19 time=20:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"] → [date=2022-12-19 time=23:00:00 timezone="Europe/Dublin"]

item.title: Western Crime Anthology
item.dc:creator: @Donogh
item.description:
@Donogh wrote:

This series of games are all in the Western Crime genre, and I intend to frame them all in the same location, albeit separated by time so that we don’t have to constrain ourselves too closely to events in previous games.

As such, while it’s highly recommended that you play all of the sessions for each individual game, you aren’t expected to sign up to all three games.

Seco Creek Vigilance Committee is an Old West RPG about justice, law, revenge, and the discrepancy between what is right and what is good.
